title: Taken For Granted
body:
Are you hungry? How does it feel, the twisting of your empty stomach? How could you have known that you would come to rely on that which you took for granted?  The small amount of food you carry is your only hope for survival... but...it, too, is temporary.
	Be warned: the time is coming when you will no longer be able to acquire the ingredients for a simple loaf of bread.
